author: mustapha zerrad
comment: App description is a key for the thief!  When u describe u can take a cam snap or on the lockscreen after trying many wrong temptations to unlock device, then u gave the thief a chance to simply cover the front cam with a sticker as long as we can disable GPS tracking even when the device still locked ( naugat).  Pls do it the smartest ! we are living smarter ! Respect for the team.

author: Peter Hogg
comment: Why do I keep getting German prompts on my English phone and why can't I uninstall this app?
title: Utter RUBBISH.

author: Mai Trang Nguyen
comment: I don't understand. This app cannot be removed! Get it off my phone :-/
title: Cannot uninstall!
